description: Crystalline mineral block with prismatic facets, bright reflections, and translucent appearance - placeholder implementation

base_colors.note: Light blue-white crystal base with subtle color variation for prismatic effect

primary_noise.note: Medium frequency for crystal facet patterns: Math.sin(globalX * 0.9 + globalY * 0.7) * 0.3

secondary_noise.note: Higher frequency for fine crystal structure: Math.cos(globalX * 1.4 + globalY * 0.8) * 0.4

tertiary_noise.note: Low frequency for large crystal formations: Math.sin((globalX + globalY) * 0.5) * 0.3

light_specks.description: Bright crystalline reflections and prismatic light spots

Secondary reflection pattern - offset grid for prismatic effect
Tertiary sparkle pattern - irregular for natural crystal variation

color_adjustment.note: Brighten to pure white for crystal reflections and light refraction

optical_effects.refraction: Light specks simulate light refraction through crystal facets
optical_effects.reflection: Bright spots represent surface reflections from crystal faces
optical_effects.transparency: Base color suggests translucent crystalline material

geological_features.facets: Triple noise creates natural crystal face patterns
geological_features.inclusions: Dark spots represent mineral inclusions and impurities
geological_features.structure: Pattern combination simulates hexagonal/cubic crystal systems

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate crystal structure noise: sin(x*0.9 + y*0.7)*0.3 + cos(x*1.4 + y*0.8)*0.4 + sin((x+y)*0.5)*0.3
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply crystal base colors: r = 180 + noise*40, g = 200 + noise*30, b = 240 + noise*15
generation_algorithm.step4: Add bright reflections at regular grid patterns (+75R, +55G, +15B)
generation_algorithm.step5: Add dark inclusions at irregular patterns (-30R, -25G, -20B)
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Creates prismatic crystal appearance with realistic optical effects
